review: This works great and as described. I wish would had seen the ad for the thumb drive before purchasing this. But all in all it works good and made my regular flat screen turn into a smart tv!

review: So far, the Fire has been a pleasure to use and painless to set up. Can't wait to find out all it can do!

review: I am really satisfied with this product. I have used another streaming device before but since I am an avid Amazon customer and prime member this was a no brainer. I love it!

review: I must admit, the streaming quality exceeded my expectations (HD with Dolby Digital sound) and the interface is quite snappy. The voice search actually works as advertised.
